WorkItem.ClosedComment: Fixed, and you can now edit item's factions with the Item Editor
WorkItem.Description:
In Rawr3's item cache Surgeon's Needle is flagged as Alliance only, this should be Neutral.
Rawr3 doesn't have an option to change the required faction for an item yet, so users can't change this themselves.
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Wrong faction flag for Surgeon's Needle
